definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be or become unclean (NH Pi. pollute (ceremonially); Aram. [[טְמָא]] and esp. deriv., t.ama0 Pa. pollute; v. RS:K 307 ff.)—
sexually, c. [[בְּ]] Le 18:20, Le 18:23 (H), Ez Eze 23:17; the land Le 18:25, Le 18:27 (H).
religiously, with idols Ez Eze 22:3; c. [[בְ]] v:Eze 22:4; with necromancers Le 19:31 (H); by sacrificing children to idols Ps 106:39.

ceremonially, by contact with carcasses of unclean animals Le 11:24, Le 11:27, Le 11:28, Le 11:31, Le 11:32, Le 11:33, Le 11:34, Le 11:34, Le 11:35, Le 11:36, Le 11:40 (P); any carcass Le 17:15 (H); eating of a carcass Le 22:8 (H); by issues Le 15:4, Le 15:9, Le 15:20, Le 15:20, Le 15:24, Le 15:27, Le 15:32 (P); by contact with an unclean man Le 5:3, Le 15:4 (P), Le 22:5 (H), or thing Le 22:6 (H); by leprosy Le 13:14, Le 13:46, Le 14:36, Le 14:46 (P); by contact with the dead Nu 6:12, Nu 19:20 (P), Ez Eze 44:25, or with one unclean by such contact Nu 19:22 (P), Hag 2:13, Hag 2:13; by contact with creeping things Le 22:5 (H); certain animals were alw. unclean Le 11:26, Le 11:27 (P). In ordinary cases of uncleanness [[טמא עד הערב]] unclean till even Le 11:24, Le 11:25, Le 11:27, Le 11:28, Le 11:31, Le 11:32, Le 11:39, Le 11:40, Le 11:40, Le 14:46, Le 15:5, Le 15:6, Le 15:7, Le 15:8, Le 15:10, Le 15:10, Le 15:11, Le 15:16, Le 15:17, Le 15:18, Le 15:19, Le 15:21, Le 15:22, Le 15:23, Le 15:27, Nu 19:7, Nu 19:8, Nu 19:10, Nu 19:21, Nu 19:22 (all P), Le 17:15, Le 22:6 (H); but uncleanness lasted 7 days for woman bearings a son Le 12:2, Le 12:2 (P), for lying with woman having an issue Le 15:24 (P), or one coming in contact with the dead Nu 19:11, Nu 19:14, Nu 19:16 (P); it lasted 14 days for a woman bearing a daughter Le 12:5 (P).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִטְמָא]] Ho 5:3, Ho 6:10; 3 fs. [[נִטְמְאָה]] Nu 5:27, Nu 5:28; [[נִטְמָָאָה]] Nu 5:13 + 5 t.; 1 s. [[נִטְמֵאתִי]] Je 2:23; 2 m.pl. [[נִטְמֵתֶם]] Le 11:43 ([[א]] omitted by scribal error; but Ges al. derive from [[טמה]]), etc. + 4 t. pf.; Pt. pl. [[נִטְמְאִים]] Ez Eze 20:30, Eze 20:31; —defile oneself, be defiled:
by idolatry conceived as whoredom Ho 5:3, Ho 6:10, Je 2:23, Ez Eze 20:30, Eze 20:31, Eze 20:43, Eze 23:7, Eze 23:13, Eze 23:30.
ceremonially, by eating creeping things Le 11:43.
be regarded as unclean (cf.

definitions.title: Pi. 4
definitions.body: ), prob. [[נִטְמִינִוּ]] Job 18:3 we are accounted as unclean; metal. from; on another view v. [[טמה]].

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[טִמֵּא]] Ge 34:5 + 15 t.; sf. [[טִמְּאוֹ]] Le 13:8 + 3 t.; 2 fs. [[טִמֵּאת]] Ez Eze 5:11, etc. + 7 t. Pf.; Impf. [[יְטַמֵּא]] 2Ki 23:8, etc. + 12 t. Impf.; Imv. pl. [[טַמְּאוּ]] Ez Eze 9:7; Inf. [[טַמֵּא]] Le 13:44 + 2 t.; sf. [[טַמְּאָם]] Le 15:31, etc. + 4 t. Inf.;—defile:
sexually Ge 34:5, Ge 34:13, Ge 34:27 (R), Ez Eze 18:6, Eze 18:11, Eze 18:15, Eze 22:11, Eze 33:26; the land by sexual impurities of the people Le 18:28 (H); Isr. by spiritual whoredom Ez Eze 23:17.

religiously: the land by bloodshed Nu 35:34 (P); by allowing the dead body of the murderer to hang on the tree over night De 21:23; by idolatry Je 2:7, Ez Eze 36:17, Eze 36:18; Isr. defiled the sacred places by the sacrifice of children Le 20:3 (H), Ez Eze 23:38, and God defiled him thereby Eze 20:26; he defileth the sacred places by idolatry 2Ch 36:14, Je 7:30 = Je 32:34, Ez Eze 5:11; the holy name of ´[[י]] Eze 43:7, Eze 43:8; Josiah defiled the idolatrous places of worship by destroying them and making them unfit for use 2Ki 23:8, 2Ki 23:10, 2Ki 23:13, 2Ki 23:16; of Isr. defiling idolatrous images Is 30:22, and the nations the temple of God Ps 79:1.

ceremonially: by ceremonial uncleanness, the sacred places Le 15:31, Nu 19:13, Nu 19:20 (P); the camp Nu 5:3 (P); the temple by dead bodies Ez Eze 9:7; the Nazirite's head of separation by a death occurring in his presence Nu 6:9 (P); the people defile themselves ([[נפשׁתיכם]]) by creeping things Le 11:44 (P).

pronounce or declare ceremonially unclean: the leper Le 13:3, Le 13:8, Le 13:11, Le 13:15, Le 13:20, Le 13:22, Le 13:25, Le 13:27, Le 13:30, Le 13:44, Le 13:44, Le 13:59 (P); unclean animals Le 20:25 (H).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[נַפְשִׁי לאׁ מְטֻמָּאָה]] Ez Eze 4:14 myself is not polluted.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִטַּמָּא]] Le 21:1 + 4 t.; pl. [[יִטַּמְּאוּ]] Ez Eze 14:11, Eze 37:23; [[יִטַּמָָּאוּ]] Ho 9:4, Ez Eze 44:25, etc. + 6 t. Impf.—reflexive, defile oneself: by eating of an unaccepted peace-offering Ho 9:4; c. [[בְּ]] Le 18:24, Le 18:30 (H), Le 11:43 (P), Ez Eze 14:11, Eze 20:7, Eze 20:18, Eze 37:23; c. [[לְ]] for a dead person Le 21:1, Le 21:3, Le 21:11 (H), Nu 6:7 (P); by Le 11:24 (P); without prep. Le 21:4 (H), Ez Eze 44:25.

definitions.title: Hothp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[אַחֲרֵי אֲשֶׁר חֻטַּמָָּאָה]] De 24:4 after that she has been defiled (sexually); on form v. Ges:§ 54. 3.
